requestParams.name: page_size
requestParams.desc: 每页显示的条目数量，最大200条

children.name: is_member
children.desc:
是否是会员
0 不是
1 是

children.name: bind_mode
children.desc:
绑定方式
0:浏览绑定
1:会员激活绑定
2:下单绑定 
3:手动添加

children.name: status
children.desc:
状态
0 未生效
1 已生效

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['pid']="3084e9ac740f39c79a5baf1910114b7c"
params['page_size']=1
params['page']=22
params['m_token']="EeGuxYOrXlnwymekzn37PzSfmB_iQq55PXx3q6N2HC4ukz7oBDSEckIduqL8ozE9iv9za3DXiVv2buGcJgBV5Xcs0KWTn8Mr7qIiSa1A6z4"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.mei.promoter.customer.list', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'3084e9ac740f39c79a5baf1910114b7c', 'page_size' => '1', 'page' => '22', 'm_token' => 'EeGuxYOrXlnwymekzn37PzSfmB_iQq55PXx3q6N2HC4ukz7oBDSEckIduqL8ozE9iv9za3DXiVv2buGcJgBV5Xcs0KWTn8Mr7qIiSa1A6z4', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
